price: তাত থাকিব তেওঁলোকৰ বাবে ফলমূল, আৰু তেওঁলোকে যিটো বিচাৰিব সেইটোৱেই পাব,
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
